attributes.action: Make it illegal for a company to advertise for a job, recieve an aplication and not respond or respond with no valid reason for dismissal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it illeagal for a company not to respond to a job aplication or to respond with no valid reason. this will stop all of the illeagal age,racial discrimination when applying for jobs
